channel.title: How do i change the exp rate (On obey pk)
channel.description: Please help me make the exp rate higher pn obey pk!

item.title: How do i change the exp rate (On obey pk)
item.dc:creator: @cute_foosa cute foosa
item.description:
@cute_foosa wrote:

its quite simple… you go into Client.Java and find the place where it says like Skill = 30 change that to like 4000000 for 4m exp each click… i think thats it…
oh well… hope it helps
